CONTRACT_ID: RMSO- Temporary Help Services EA372-210001 E
department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Temporary help services for federal government departments and agencies in Nova Scotia, Prince Edward Island, New Brunswick and Newfoundland and Labrador.
description: This requirement is for the provision of temporary help services to federal government departments and agencies in one or more of the geographical Areas listed in Annex "A" Statement of Work, on an as and when requested basis. It is intended to issue multiple Standing Offers to qualified Offerors as the result of this Request for Standing Offer process. The period for making call-ups against the resulting Standing Offer is from June 1, 2023 to May 31, 2024, with the irrevocable right to extend for 1 additional one year period. This procurement includes a Voluntary Set-Aside for Aboriginal Business.

full_summary:
### Request for Standing Offer: Temporary Help Services
#### RMSO- Temporary Help Services EA372-210001 E
#### OCPR – Services d’aide temporaire EA372-210001 E

**Tender Announcement Details**
| **Field** | **Information** |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | WS3972930449-Doc3972947115 |
| **Tender Status** | Expired |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 2023-05-10T14:00:00 |
| **Publication Date** | 2023-04-19 |
| **Contracting Entity** | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) |
| **End User Entity** | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) |

**Services Required**
We are seeking skilled professionals to provide temporary help services to federal government departments and agencies in Nova Scotia, Prince Edward Island, New Brunswick, and Newfoundland and Labrador. The services will be provided on an as-and-when-requested basis from June 1, 2023 to May 31, 2024, with the option to extend for an additional year.

**Trade Agreements**
The procurement process is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Procurement Method**
This is a competitive bid process, with variations or combinations of the above methods used to evaluate bids.

**Regions of Opportunity**
No restrictions apply to this procurement.

**Contact Information**
For more information, please contact Rhonda Lacey (SPAC/PSPC) at rhonda.lacey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Tender Description**
The government intends to issue multiple Standing Offers to qualified Offerors as a result of this Request for Standing Offer process. Services will be provided on an as-and-when-requested basis, with the option to extend for an additional year. The procurement includes a voluntary set-aside for Aboriginal Business.

### Important Dates
- **Tender Closing Date:** Thursday, May 10, 2023, at 2:00 PM ET
- **Contract Start Date:** June 1, 2023
- **Contract End Date:** May 31, 2024
- **Extension Option:** June 1, 2025
